amendment.description: Amendment sought to make reductions in funding for various programs not currently authorized and to apply the aggregate savings of $128,920,000 to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for sundry accounts and to apply the aggregate savings of $128,920,000 to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 295 (Roll no. 195).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 295 (Roll no. 195).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. McClintock.
